head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:when

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:when

body.p: The xsl:when element is used within an xsl:choose element to indicate one of a number of choices. It takes a mandatory parameter, test, whose value is a match pattern. If this is the first xsl:when element within the enclosing xsl:choose whose test condition matches the current element, the content of the xsl:when element is expanded, otherwise it is ignored.
